languages.text: "Значит, новой главой династии стал{mf||а} {mf|тот|та}, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}кто большую часть жизни{/d} служил{mf||а} Лекс Империалис. Все же лучше получить хорошую и плохую новость, чем только плохую. Я передам маршалу Страксу обе".

"So then, the new head of the dynasty is someone {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}who has spent most of {mf|his|her} life{/d} serving the Lex Imperialis. I suppose it is better to receive both good and bad news than just bad. I will be sure to report both of these developments to Marshal Strachs."
languages.original_text: "Значит, новой главой династии стал{mf||а} {mf|тот|та}, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}кто большую часть жизни{/d} служил{mf||а} Лекс Империалис. Все же лучше получить хорошую и плохую новость, чем только плохую. Я передам маршалу Страксу обе".

traits.locale_text: "So then, the new head of the dynasty is someone who has spent most of {mf|his|her} life serving the Lex Imperialis. I suppose it is better to receive both good and bad news than just bad. I will be sure to report both of these developments to Marshal Strachs."

"So then, the new head of the dynasty is someone who has spent most of {mf|his|her} life serving the Lex Imperialis. I suppose it is better to receive both good and bad news than just bad. I will be sure to report both of these developments to Marshal Strachs."

"So then, the new head of the dynasty is someone who has spent most of {mf|his|her} life serving the Lex Imperialis. I suppose it is better to receive both good and bad news than just bad. I will be sure to report both of these developments to Marshal Strachs."

"So then, the new head of the dynasty is someone who has spent most of {mf|his|her} life serving the Lex Imperialis. I suppose it is better to receive both good and bad news than just bad. I will be sure to report both of these developments to Marshal Strachs."

"So then, the new head of the dynasty is someone {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}who has spent most of {mf|his|her} life{/d} serving the Lex Imperialis. I suppose it is better to receive both good and bad news than just bad. I will be sure to report both of these developments to Marshal Strachs."

"So then, the new head of the dynasty is someone {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}who has spent most of {mf|his|her} life{/d} serving the Lex Imperialis. I suppose it is better to receive both good and bad news than just bad. I will be sure to report both of these developments to Marshal Strachs."

languages.text: "Dann ist das neue Oberhaupt der Dynastie also {mf|ein Mann, der|eine Frau, die} zeitlebens dem {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Lex Imperia gedient hat{/d}. Ich nehme an, es ist besser, gute und schlechte Nachrichten zu erhalten, als nur schlechte. Ich werde Marschall Strachs beide Entwicklungen melden."
languages.original_text: "So then, the new head of the dynasty is someone {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}who has spent most of {mf|his|her} life{/d} serving the Lex Imperialis. I suppose it is better to receive both good and bad news than just bad. I will be sure to report both of these developments to Marshal Strachs."

traits.locale_text: "Dann ist das neue Oberhaupt der Dynastie also {mf|ein Mann, der|eine Frau, die} zeitlebens dem Lex Imperia gedient hat. Ich nehme an, es ist besser, gute und schlechte Nachrichten zu erhalten, als nur schlechte. Ich werde Marschall Strachs beide Entwicklungen melden."

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, la dynastie est désormais sous l'égide de quelqu'un qui a passé la majeure partie de sa vie {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}à servir la Lex Imperialis{/d}. J'imagine qu'il vaut mieux recevoir à la fois une bonne et une mauvaise nouvelle, plutôt qu'uniquement une mauvaise. Je veillerai à rapporter ces deux développements au maréchal Strachs. »
languages.original_text: "So then, the new head of the dynasty is someone {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}who has spent most of {mf|his|her} life{/d} serving the Lex Imperialis. I suppose it is better to receive both good and bad news than just bad. I will be sure to report both of these developments to Marshal Strachs."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, la dynastie est désormais sous l'égide de quelqu'un qui a passé la majeure partie de sa vie à servir la Lex Imperialis. J'imagine qu'il vaut mieux recevoir à la fois une bonne et une mauvaise nouvelle, plutôt qu'uniquement une mauvaise. Je veillerai à rapporter ces deux développements au maréchal Strachs. »

languages.text: «Así que {mf|el nuevo|la nueva} cabeza de la dinastía es alguien que se ha pasado {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}la mayor parte del tiempo{/d} al servicio de la Lex Imperialis. Supongo que recibir buenas y malas noticias siempre es mejor que recibir solamente de las malas. Me aseguraré de informar de ambos sucesos al mariscal Strachs».
languages.original_text: "So then, the new head of the dynasty is someone {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}who has spent most of {mf|his|her} life{/d} serving the Lex Imperialis. I suppose it is better to receive both good and bad news than just bad. I will be sure to report both of these developments to Marshal Strachs."

traits.locale_text: «Así que {mf|el nuevo|la nueva} cabeza de la dinastía es alguien que se ha pasado la mayor parte del tiempo al servicio de la Lex Imperialis. Supongo que recibir buenas y malas noticias siempre es mejor que recibir solamente de las malas. Me aseguraré de informar de ambos sucesos al mariscal Strachs».

languages.text: “原来是这样，王朝的新任领袖曾为{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}帝国法务部效力多年{/d}，这确实算得上不幸中的万幸。我会把坏消息和这个好消息一同汇报给斯塔克斯元帅。”
languages.original_text: "So then, the new head of the dynasty is someone {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}who has spent most of {mf|his|her} life{/d} serving the Lex Imperialis. I suppose it is better to receive both good and bad news than just bad. I will be sure to report both of these developments to Marshal Strachs."

traits.locale_text: “原来是这样，王朝的新任领袖曾为帝国法务部效力多年，这确实算得上不幸中的万幸。我会把坏消息和这个好消息一同汇报给斯塔克斯元帅。”

languages.text: 「つまり、新たな王朝の当主は、その人生のほとんどを{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}レックス・インペリアへの奉仕に{/d}捧げてきた人物というわけですね。悪い知らせだけを受け取るよりは、良い知らせと悪い知らせの両方がある方がまだ良いでしょう。この二つの件については、忘れずにストラッチス将帥に報告しておきます」
languages.original_text: "So then, the new head of the dynasty is someone {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}who has spent most of {mf|his|her} life{/d} serving the Lex Imperialis. I suppose it is better to receive both good and bad news than just bad. I will be sure to report both of these developments to Marshal Strachs."

traits.locale_text: 「つまり、新たな王朝の当主は、その人生のほとんどをレックス・インペリアへの奉仕に捧げてきた人物というわけですね。悪い知らせだけを受け取るよりは、良い知らせと悪い知らせの両方がある方がまだ良いでしょう。この二つの件については、忘れずにストラッチス将帥に報告しておきます」

languages.text: "Demek hanedanlığın yeni önderi, ömrünün kayda değer bir kadarını {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}Lex İmperialis'e hizmet ederek geçirmiş biri{/d}. Zannımca sadece kötü haber işitmektense hem iyi hem de kötü haber almak yeğdir. Bu iki gelişmeyi de Miralay Strachs'a derhâl bildireceğim."
languages.original_text: "So then, the new head of the dynasty is someone {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}who has spent most of {mf|his|her} life{/d} serving the Lex Imperialis. I suppose it is better to receive both good and bad news than just bad. I will be sure to report both of these developments to Marshal Strachs."

traits.locale_text: "Demek hanedanlığın yeni önderi, ömrünün kayda değer bir kadarını Lex İmperialis'e hizmet ederek geçirmiş biri. Zannımca sadece kötü haber işitmektense hem iyi hem de kötü haber almak yeğdir. Bu iki gelişmeyi de Miralay Strachs'a derhâl bildireceğim."

languages.original_text: "So then, the new head of the dynasty is someone who has spent most of {mf|his|her} life serving the Lex Imperialis. I suppose it is better to receive both good and bad news than just bad. I will be sure to report both of these developments to Marshal Strachs."
